Class RatingSummary

public class RatingSummary
extends AbstractRatingSummary
Ratings Summary supporting inner and outer statistics of the review

    • RatingSummary

      public RatingSummary​(java.lang.String id, long degree, float productAvg, float productStDev, float reviewerAvg, float reviewerStDev)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - product/review id
      degree - number of times reviewed
      productAvg - average rating of the product
      productStDev - standard deviation of the product's rating
      reviewerAvg - average rating of the reviewer
      reviewerStDev - standard deviation of the reviewer's ratings
